coding_practice.title: Strange Printer
coding_practice.description:
There is a strange printer with the following two special properties:

The printer can only print a sequence of the same character each time.
At each turn, the printer can print new characters starting from and ending at any place and will cover the original existing characters.
Given a string s, return the minimum number of turns the printer needed to print it.

examples.explanation: Print "aaa" first and then print "b" from the second place of the string, which will cover the existing character 'a'.

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 100
s consists of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 dp[i][j] 表示打印子字串 s[i:j+1] 的最少次數。
2. 初始化 dp[i][i] = 1，每個單字符至少一次打印。
3. 遍歷所有子字串，假設第一個字符是 s[i]，初始次數為 1 + dp[i+1][j]。
4. 遍歷 i+1 到 j 的索引 k，如果 s[k] == s[i]，表示可以合併打印，更新 dp[i][j]。
5. 最終 dp[0][n-1] 即為整個字串最少打印次數。
6. 時間複雜度 O(n^3)，空間複雜度 O(n^2)。
